desc: House of AnLi is a unique European interior and food concept store offering a wide range of indoor and outdoor furniture, Belgian linen, tapestries , Laguiole cutlery, tableware, lights and everything you need to make your house a home. You can even customize your own sofa or bed with our Belgian upholstery.

layout.text: From quick styling tips to home makeovers,
our interior stylists are here to help.
